title: Open BETA black screen
body:
Hey guys, so iv'e just downloaded the beta client.... and when i go to launch the game (Like click the button that says launch), it starts as usual but then goes to a black screen..... I can still hear the menu music but there is nothing, i cant even hit the close button at the top right of the client....
Please help!! im going through league withdrawels :0

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should continue to use the legacy client for now.

This can be launched from your games installation directory (Default, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\) by running the file named lol.launcher.exe
But it doesn't work, lounch Always the new client after the start :( i have to click right down of the black window to lounch the old version...

If only this actually worked...... i tried this before i even posted lol
{{item:3070}}
I also have this problem, have you managed to fix it yet?
